#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <utility>
//#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
using namespace std;

int max1(int a,int b, int c)
{
	int d = min(a,b);
	return min(d,c);
}
int main()
{
    int n,m;
    //freopen("a.txt","r",stdin);
    cin>>n;
    vector<string> v(n);
    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
    {
    	cin>>v[i];
    }
    sort(v.begin(),v.end());
	string s1,s2;
    int ma = 0,temp =0, k=0,sum;
	for(int i = 1; i < n; i++)
    {
    	s1 = v[i-1];
    	s2 = v[i];
    	k = min(s1.length(),s2.length());
    	sum = 0;
    	for(int j = 0; j < k; j++)
    	{
    		if(v[i][j]==v[i-1][j])
    			sum++;
   			else break;
    	}
    	if(temp < sum) temp = sum;
    }
    
    cout<<temp;
    return 0;
}
